game.name: Deep Board Go
game.shortDescription: 아름다운 3D 바둑판과 직관적인 카메라 조작, 학습과 대국 실력 향상을 돕는 스마트 AI로 바둑을 새롭게 경험하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Experience Go (围棋 / 圍棋 / 바둑 / 囲碁) in beautiful 3D with handcrafted boards, smooth camera controls, and smart AI. The physical beauty of Go is a big part of its charm, and DeepBoardGO brings that tactile elegance into the digital world for a fresh, closer experience.
